Power Switch Pro Python Library Documentation
==============================================

A Python library for communicating with Digital Loggers Power Switch Pro devices via their REST API.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   device
   quickstart
   api
   examples
   contributing

Features
--------

* Full support for DLI REST-style API
* Control power outlets (on/off/cycle)
* Query device status and configuration
* Manage users and authentication
* Monitor power metrics (voltage, current, energy)
* Configure AutoPing settings
* Execute scripts
* HTTP Digest Authentication support
* CSRF protection built-in
